## WCH\_TOKEN\_INLINE\_EDIT\_SERVICE variable

Token used to inject the `WchInlineEditServiceV2` service.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
WCH_TOKEN_INLINE_EDIT_SERVICE: InjectionToken<WchInlineEditServiceV2>
```
